      See Also:

    • renderAdView

      public android.view.View renderAdView​(T adUnit)
      Renders a View based on the AdViewBinder that was registered. Layout will be inflated and AdUnit information will be filled in the nested views. If either adUnit is null or no AdViewBinder has been registered null will be returned.
      Parameters:
      adUnit - a loaded AdUnit
      Returns:
      a View based on the registered AdViewBinder
      See Also:
      AdUnit, AdViewBinder
